THE ALABAMA LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCY CURRENTLY OPERATES A FLEET OF OH58 HELICOPTERS.  THE UNIT SUPPORTS STATE, LOCAL AND FEDERAL AGENCIES IN A LAW ENFORCEMENT CAPACITY.  THESE AIRCRAFT ARE USED FOR SEARCHES FOR MISSING CHILDREN, MISSING ALZHEIMER'S PATIENTS, AND FLEEING FUGITIVES.  WE ALSO SUPPORT IN DRUG ERADICATION PROGRAMS AND HOMELAND SECURITY MISSIONS.  THESE PARTS WILL CONTINUE TO SUSTAIN UNIT OPERATIONS FOR THE FUTURE.

THE STATION IS BEING COOLED BY PORTABLE UNITS BUT HAS NO MEANS OF HEATING IN THE WINTER. THE COVINA POLICE DEPARTMENT WILL USE THESE CARTS TO DEPLOY OFFICERS DURING LARGE PUBLIC EVENTS SUCH AS OUR ANNUAL CHRISTMAS PARADE AND OTHER EVENTS WHERE RESPONDING IN VEHICLES IS NOT PRACTICAL.  THESE CARTS WILL ALLOW OFFICERS TO PATROL OR RESPOND TO EMERGENCIES IN THESE SITUATIONS IN A MORE EFFECTIVE, SAFE MANNER.

THE COVINA POLICE DEPARTMENT WILL USE THIS MOTORIZED CART DURING LARGE SCALE EVENTS INVOLVING LARGE NUMBERS OF CITIZENS ON FOOT.  THESE EVENTS ARE OFTEN NOT SAFE FOR THE USE OF TRADITIONAL POLICE VEHICLES TO GET OFFICERS TO CALLS OR EVENTS.  THESE VEHICLES WILL MAKE IT SAFER FOR OFFICERS AND THE COMMUNITY.

THE COVINA POLICE DEPARTMENT WILL USE THESE POWER LINE CONDITIONERS WHEN OPERATING AN EOC DURING CRITICAL INCIDENTS SUCH AS AN ACTIVE SHOOTER OR TERROR MOTIVATED INCIDENT.  THIS EQUIPMENT WILL PROTECT VITAL EQUIPMENT SUCH AS COMPUTERS AND RADIO SYSTEMS FROM POWER SURGES ENSURE THE EQUIPMENT REMAINS OPERATIONAL.

THE COVINA POLICE DEPARTMENT WILL USE THE HUMAN REMAINS POUCHES DURING INCIDENTS SUCH AS NATURAL DISASTERS, ACTIVE SHOOTERS OR TERROR MOTIVATED INCIDENTS TO SECURE THE REMAINS OF VICTIMS SO THEY CAN BE TRANSPORTED, STORED AND SECURED FOLLOWING THIS TYPE OF INCIDENT.  THIS WILL AID IN THE INVESTIGATION, PRESERVATION OF EVIDENCE AND THE PREVENTION OF SPREADING DISEASE.

THE PINELLAS COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE IS A FULL SERVICE LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCY PROVIDING 24 HOUR 365 DAY SERVICES.  OUR AGENCY HAS AN AUTHORIZED LAW ENFORCEMENT STRENGTH OF 823 MEMBERS.  THIS VEHICLE WILL BE USED FOR FLOOD WATER RESCUE DURING SEVERE WEATHER EVENTS OR DISASTERS.  ADDITIONALLY, THE VEHICLE WOULD BE USED IF OUR AGENCY WERE DEPLOYED FOR MUTUAL AID AS A RESULT OF SEVERE WEATHER OR DISASTER.

THE PINELLAS COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE PROVIDES 24 HOUR PER DAY 7 DAY PER WEEK FULL LAW ENFORCEMENT SERVICES THROUGHOUT UNINCORPORATED PINELLAS COUNTY AND THIRTEEN CONTRACT CITIES. THE INKSTER POLICE DEPARTMENT IS IN NEED OF A TRAILER FOR ASSIGNMENT TO OUR ILLEGAL DUMPING TASK FORCE TO ASSIST WITH MOVING EQUIPMENT FOR CLEAN UP, SURVEILLANCE EQUIPMENT, ETC. THIS TRAILER WOULD BENEFIT OUR DEPARTMENT GREATLY.

THE INKSTER POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEEKING THIS BUS TO TRANSPORT POLICE PERSONNEL FOR TRAINING, POLICE SITUATIONS DURING MUTUAL AID REQUESTS, DURING DISASTERS, EMERGENCY OPERATIONS, AND TO TRANSPORT MEMBERS OF OUR YOUTH PROGRAMS TO AND FROM POLICE FUNCTIONS, AS WELL AS FOR USE DURING EMERGENCY EVACUATIONS OF CIVILIANS. OUR CITY'S SCHOOL DISTRICT WAS CLOSED DOWN IN 2013 AND WITH THE CLOSING ALL OF THEIR BUSES WERE LIQUIDATED ELIMINATING OUR ONLY OPTION FOR EMERGENCY BUSES FOR USE DURING DISASTERS.

THE INKSTER POLICE DEPARTMENT'S ILLEGAL DUMPING TASK FORCE IS IN NEED OF A DUMP TRUCK TO ASSIST LAW ENFORCEMENT WITH THE CLEAN UPS OF AREAS IN OUR CITY PLAGUED BY DUMPING. IT IS A SERIOUS ISSUE FOR OUR COMMUNITY. INKSTER IS A FINANCIALLY DISTRESSED CITY, WE HAVE THE RESOURCES TO MAINTAIN THIS VEHICLE BUT COULD NOT PURCHASE ONE ON OUR OWN.

THE INKSTER POLICE DEPARTMENT'S ILLEGAL DUPING TASK FORCE IS IN NEED OF THIS VEHICLE TO ASSIST WITH THE CLEAN UPS OF DUMPING SITES, AND MAINTENANCE OF SITES BY LAW ENFORCEMENT AND COMMUNITY PERSONNEL. ILLEGAL DUMPING IS PLAGUING OUR COMMUNITY, AND INKSTER IS A FINANCIALLY DISTRESSED CITY. WE HAVE THE RESOURCES TO MAINTAIN THIS VEHICLE BUT CANNOT AFFORD TO PURCHASE ON OUR OWN. THIS VEHICLE WOULD BENEFIT OUR AGENCY GREATLY.

TOURNIQUETS ARE A CONSUMABLE ITEM THAT IS COMMONLY USED DURING MEDICAL EMERGENCIES.  THE TOURNIQUETS ARE USED BY PATROL OFFICERS AND SWAT OFFICERS.  THESE ITEMS PROVIDE A QUICK AND EFFECTIVE WAY TO STOP BLEEDING DURING MEDICAL EMERGENCIES.  THIS REQUISITION WILL RESUPPLY OUR OFFICE MEDICAL INVENTORY.

FULL FACE DIVING MASKS WILL AID THE SHERIFFS OFFICE DIVE AND RECOVERY UNIT. THE MASKS WILL PROTECT THE DIVERS FACE FROM CONTAMINATED WATER AND ACT AS A SHIELD FROM SHARP OBJECTS. THIS UNIT FREQUENTLY DIVES IN LESS THAN IDEAL CONDITIONS DURING TRAINING AND OPERATIONAL TASKS. THE UNIT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR EVIDENCE AND BODY RECOVERIES.

THIS RADIO DEVICE IS USED FOR UNDERWATER COMMUNICATION WITH DIVERS. THE RADIO WOULD BE UTILIZED BY THE SHERBURNE COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE DIVE AND RECOVERY TEAM. THIS TEAM IS RESPONSIBLE FOR RECOVERING EVIDENCE AND BODIES IN WATERS THAT GENERALLY PROVIDE LIMITED TO ZERO VISIBILITY.  THE RADIOS WOULD INCREASE SAFETY BY ALLOWING DIVERS TO COMMUNICATE PROBLEMS TO THE SURFACE.

THE SCPD HAS 2,471 SWORN OFFICERS AS OF FEBRUARY 2017 ASSIGNED TO NUMEROUS PLAIN CLOTHES COMMANDS.  OFTEN THESE PLAIN CLOTHES OFFICERS ARE REQUIRED TO CHANGE IN THE POLICE UNIFORM FOR A DETAIL.  THESE CLOTHING LOCKERS WOULD BE UTILIZED BY LAW ENFORCEMENT PERSONNEL FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT PURPOSES.

THE SCPD HAS 2,471 SWORN OFFICERS AS OF FEBRUARY 2017 WITH NUMEROUS OFFICERS ASSIGNED TO PLAIN CLOTHES UNITS. THE SCPD HAS 2,471 SWORN OFFICERS AS OF FEBRUARY 2017 AND HAS 1,271 DESKTOP COMPUTERS.  DUE TO THE LARGE NUMBER OF COMPUTER WORKSTATIONS THAT ARE IN OPERATION 24 HOURS A DAY 7 DAYS A WEEK, THE SCPD IS ALWAYS IN NEED OF CHAIRS.  THESE CHAIRS WOULD BE USED BY LAW ENFORCEMENT PERSONNEL FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT PURPOSES.

THE SCPD EMERGENCY SERVICE SECTION HAS A NEED FOR A DUMP TRUCK.  THIS UNIT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DESTRUCTION OF ILLEGAL FIREWORKS AND NEEDS TO TRANSPORT AND DUMP THESE FIREWORKS AT THE BURN YARD.  SCPD WILL BE PARTICIPATING IN OR HAS HOSTED EVENTS SUCH AS THE 2018 US GOLF OPEN, PRESIDENTIAL VISITS, AND SUFFOLK COUNTY MARATHON.  THIS VEHICLE WOULD BE UTILIZED FOR CROWD PROTECTION AT SUCH EVENTS AND FOR HIGH WATER RESCUE.

THE SCPD HAS A NEED FOR PAPER TO PROCESS ARRESTS AND 1ST DISTRICT COURT INSISTS ON PAPER COPIES OF THE ARREST PAPERWORK.  THIS PAPER WOULD BE USED BY LAW ENFORCEMENT PERSONNEL FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT PURPOSES.

Justification: THE SC CRIMINAL JUSTICE ACADEMY CERTIFIES EVERY LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICER IN THE STATE.  THIS ORGANIZATION IS ATTEMPTING TO IMPLEMENT A MORE CONTEMPORARY METHOD OF CONDUCTING ACADEMIC TESTING THROUGHOUT THE BASIC TRAINING PROGRAM.  THE REQUISITIONED ITEMS WILL GREATLY ASSIST IN BEGINNING THIS INITIATIVE.

Station Name (LEA): SC LE TRG COUNCIL/CRIM JUST ACADEMY
Justification: THE SC CRIMINAL JUSTICE ACADEMY TRAINS ALL LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS IN THE STATE.  THIS ITEM WILL ASSIST WITH PROVIDING EAR PROTECTION FOR ALL FIREARMS TRAINING ACTIVITIES TO INCLUDE BASIC TRAINING AS WELL AS ADVANCED LEVEL TRAINING.
